channel.title: sort of error on firefox
channel.description:
everytime I open a new page or anything I get this error
TypeError: ToolbarControl.getSettingByType is not a function
some times it just pops up ones other is pops up with the names of sites like facebook and ad something above it.

item.title: sort of error on firefox
item.dc:creator: darkone
item.description:
no file called appdata on my computer in taht area.

sorry look in wrong area found it.

Read full topic

item.title: sort of error on firefox
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
have you tried wiping your FF profile and starting clean?
backup your bookmarks and navigate to C:\Users~Your User Account~\AppData and erase Mozilla folders in Local and Roaming

no reinstall required, unless problem persists

Read full topic
